CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Like or Comment stage positioned above or below the View Content stage?
SRP.A: The Like or Comment stage is positioned {below} the View Content stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Share Content?
VE.A: The value of stage Share Content is {192}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Join Group or Community?
VE.A: The value of stage Join Group or Community is {80}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage View Content?
VE.A: The value of stage View Content is {481}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Content, with a value of {481}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Content Creation or Upload, with a value of {70}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage View Content to stage Like or Comment?
SC.A: Decreased by {167} Million Users from stage View Content to stage Like or Comment.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community?
SC.A: Decreased by {61} Million Users from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Join Group or Community to stage Content Creation or Upload?
SC.A: Decreased by {10} Million Users from stage Join Group or Community to stage Content Creation or Upload.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 253? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {View Content} stage has {481}, the {Like or Comment} stage has {314}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 75? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Content Creation or Upload} stage has {70}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 110 and 253? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Share Content} stage has {192}, the {Follow Account} stage has {141}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Share Content to Follow Account, or from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Share Content} to {Follow Account} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community, or from stage Like or Comment to Share Content?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Like or Comment} to {Share Content} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage View Content to Like or Comment, from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload, or from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Content} to stage {Like or Comment} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {View Content} and {Like or Comment} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Join Group or Community} and {Content Creation or Upload} stages.
